Key Match Events: Youri Tielemans scored in the second minute of the match
Kevin De Bruyne converted direct from Belgium goalkeeper Koen Casteels' long kick in the 80th minute
Romelu Lukaku had a third goal ruled out by VAR at these Euros
Pre-Game Insights: Belgium needed to win otherwise they were going home
The team knew what they needed to do to get back on track
Post-Match Reflections: Belgium coach Domenico Tedesco said he was'very relieved' they won the game and it was'very important' to get the three points
Tedesco thought his team took too long to seal the win and that scoring four or five goals was possible
Miscellaneous Highlights: All four teams in Group E have three points and there is all to play for in the final round of games on Wednesday
Belgium has been criticized for failing to live up to expectations in the past
Others: Dennis Man could have evened the score when running through on goal, but was denied by Casteels
The keeper then turned provider with a long punt upfield, which De Bruyne raced on to and fired home
